mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sms_history (idx, sms_type, phone_number, `contents`, event_time) VALUES (NULL, #{sType}, #{phoneNumber}, #{data}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sms_history AS sh WHERE sh.phone_number = #{phoneNumber} AND NOW() BETWEEN sh.event_time AND DATE_ADD(sh.event_time,INTERVAL 3 MINUTE)

SELECT phone_number as 'phoneNum', `contents` as 'validationNum', event_time FROM sms_history AS sh WHERE sh.phone_number = #{phoneNumber} AND NOW() BETWEEN sh.event_time AND DATE_ADD(sh.event_time,INTERVAL 3 MINUTE) ORDER BY sh.event_time DESC LIMIT 1
